entry.title: Unbreaking testnet4
entry.summary: In the exchange between Garlo Nicon and Murch, a correction was made regarding a previously mentioned date. Initially, there seems to have been a misunderstanding or miscommunication about a specific date relevant to their discussion on the Bitcoin Development Mailing List. Murch clarifies that the intended date for their subject of concern is actually a week later than what was previously stated, specifying the correct date as January 8, 2026. This correction ensures that all participants in the conversation are on the same page regarding the timeline of events or milestones discussed within the context of the Bitcoin Development community. The conversation underscores the importance of precise communication within such technical discussions, especially when dealing with timelines that could impact project planning or development milestones.
